baeb49ba-8ade-4978-baab-189206ad4a76.name: Atribute Penalty; -1 to ST or HT per level

bd0d0021-de18-4805-baf8-438c7a264387.name: Negated Advantage; one point per level

d63d58dd-8398-4fda-b71d-e08791bf2876.name: Extended Duration - Permanent (Dispelled by resisting 2 consecutive nights)

4460f17b-b277-4e39-aa5c-c2bfc713eb57.name: Directional
4460f17b-b277-4e39-aa5c-c2bfc713eb57.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

5d3df63c-f230-40d0-86b5-20531035fc62.name: Tough Skin
5d3df63c-f230-40d0-86b5-20531035fc62.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

9534e22e-4cde-4ee0-840f-056632cd7d5c.name: Oxygen Storage
9534e22e-4cde-4ee0-840f-056632cd7d5c.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

3353c56e-42e8-47e7-b825-194d352a8670.name: Oxygen Storage
3353c56e-42e8-47e7-b825-194d352a8670.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

24441d85-77cc-4733-985a-5e37ed97dc03.name: Oxygen Storage
24441d85-77cc-4733-985a-5e37ed97dc03.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

5ac1387a-b106-48f7-a3d5-f422a2106257.name: Oxygen Storage
5ac1387a-b106-48f7-a3d5-f422a2106257.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

4a9b8061-51d6-4416-92be-d40f753b203b.name: Oxygen Storage
4a9b8061-51d6-4416-92be-d40f753b203b.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

db910e11-bccf-4650-8b74-34545072cca3.name: Diffuse
db910e11-bccf-4650-8b74-34545072cca3.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

19474a5a-f2db-4258-a8da-eaf32e1a0d0d.name: Homogenous
19474a5a-f2db-4258-a8da-eaf32e1a0d0d.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

d2906466-c0d6-4767-86c1-907cfa5c2ebe.name: No Blood
d2906466-c0d6-4767-86c1-907cfa5c2ebe.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

3d1cfa77-b2a2-4fd9-b434-3e68d3b4d229.name: No Brain
3d1cfa77-b2a2-4fd9-b434-3e68d3b4d229.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

5e35cf2d-4a08-4d67-9af5-d8dc2fe182f6.name: No Eyes
5e35cf2d-4a08-4d67-9af5-d8dc2fe182f6.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

460d9a25-a343-4035-b68f-376c0900e034.name: No Head
460d9a25-a343-4035-b68f-376c0900e034.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

ea0436a1-bd71-4bcb-b7f8-141941bf5c93.name: No Neck
ea0436a1-bd71-4bcb-b7f8-141941bf5c93.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

89cfc7d6-62de-4c9c-a5d2-cead2b05393d.name: No Vitals
89cfc7d6-62de-4c9c-a5d2-cead2b05393d.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

c067699a-e536-400e-a4db-0f892eb5e550.name: Unliving
c067699a-e536-400e-a4db-0f892eb5e550.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

b7727bfa-a7e2-44c8-b951-684c71a5a30f.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

2e616b12-70c0-4147-bef7-a6a8e465314d.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

4214eb90-9f68-44fa-9b86-96bc4da009ae.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

8ee3e3f0-03dd-4df0-a070-9ad83c7cbee0.name: Alternate Benefit
8ee3e3f0-03dd-4df0-a070-9ad83c7cbee0.notes: Bonus to resist deception involving numbers

8c58791f-8ac8-46d1-9ca8-f27d8ec2a58a.name: Blindness
8c58791f-8ac8-46d1-9ca8-f27d8ec2a58a.notes: -6 to all combat skills; cannot target hit locations

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

9c79ead2-0f69-48ed-8c6f-394208c3508c.name: Obsession (All Organic Lifeforms Must Be Destroyed)
9c79ead2-0f69-48ed-8c6f-394208c3508c.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

features.situation: toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled

b5cfbe94-0ab3-4990-a7f7-11f866e609f7.name: Data Retrieval
b5cfbe94-0ab3-4990-a7f7-11f866e609f7.notes: Cyberpsi ability. Can retrieve files and info from computers.

5fc06809-2ebf-4c2c-ab88-50f36fcbf8e6.name: Data Retrieval_1
5fc06809-2ebf-4c2c-ab88-50f36fcbf8e6.notes: Requires touching the computer or network cable.

2d04c74c-2b6c-4a02-87d2-d6be56021b72.name: Data Retrieval_2
2d04c74c-2b6c-4a02-87d2-d6be56021b72.notes: Data access at range; -1 penalty per yard of distance.

50d6fa3d-f2d6-4d0b-8f3e-4215c25bf219.name: Data Retrieval_3
50d6fa3d-f2d6-4d0b-8f3e-4215c25bf219.notes: Data access at range using normal range penalties on p. B550

18b684dd-b1ff-432f-aef4-297082236189.name: Data Retrieval_4
18b684dd-b1ff-432f-aef4-297082236189.notes: Data access at range using long-distance modifiers on p. B241

3d2bce38-74a5-4f10-9b9f-507b1d9f5fc7.name: I/O Tap
3d2bce38-74a5-4f10-9b9f-507b1d9f5fc7.notes: Cyberpsi ability. Monitor input and output from a single system.

af15779a-d0e1-4f18-a680-d0d06529437b.name: I/O Tap_1
af15779a-d0e1-4f18-a680-d0d06529437b.notes: Requires touching the computer or network cable.

79fd1649-2f25-4b82-9f88-d19bba964a23.name: I/O Tap_2
79fd1649-2f25-4b82-9f88-d19bba964a23.notes: I/O tap at range; -1 penalty per yard of distance.

7db10cd1-9fe7-455b-a6f5-340849296498.name: I/O Tap_3
7db10cd1-9fe7-455b-a6f5-340849296498.notes: I/O Tap at range using normal range penalties on p. B550

188cb300-ef1c-42bc-9d51-865d33ded965.name: I/O Tap_4
188cb300-ef1c-42bc-9d51-865d33ded965.notes: I/O Tap at range using long-distance modifiers on p. B241

7079279b-b7ea-4b60-a44f-d517fa779ca4.name: Netrunning
7079279b-b7ea-4b60-a44f-d517fa779ca4.notes: Cyberpsi ability. You can project into and take over computer systems.

26c16141-b805-46f1-bafa-631fbb59c324.name: Netrunning_5
26c16141-b805-46f1-bafa-631fbb59c324.notes: 1 second of concentration; Stay in 3x longer

b9d59f5d-b446-4f9a-8234-1f10fa0e8ace.name: Netrunning_6
b9d59f5d-b446-4f9a-8234-1f10fa0e8ace.notes: 1 second of concentration; Stay in 6x longer

468bf059-a9f3-42ac-9015-dc635e6717aa.name: Netrunning_7
468bf059-a9f3-42ac-9015-dc635e6717aa.notes: 1 second of concentration; Stay in as long as desired

24c95228-d4a8-43fe-b45b-fbcb30a251ee.name: Remote Control
24c95228-d4a8-43fe-b45b-fbcb30a251ee.notes: Cyberpsi ability. You can issue orders to a computer.

7aab9095-9d03-4b29-8d24-c2a2154ace55.name: Remote Control_1
7aab9095-9d03-4b29-8d24-c2a2154ace55.notes: Requires touching the computer or network cable.

084cee52-559f-477f-8dd3-f9f730c91c13.name: Remote Control_2
084cee52-559f-477f-8dd3-f9f730c91c13.notes: Data access at range; -1 penalty per yard of distance.

f2ca726c-b7f4-4778-bc8b-66743f181b72.name: Remote Control_3
f2ca726c-b7f4-4778-bc8b-66743f181b72.notes: Data access at range using normal range penalties on p. B550

f82bbc88-db88-4a14-b804-69e79628313f.name: Remote Control_4
f82bbc88-db88-4a14-b804-69e79628313f.notes: Data access at range using long-distance modifiers on p. B241
